name: Robin Fruit
description:
Was there ever any revolution as fun and crazy as this ever in the history? When Robin and her companions enter the city they will not leave any vegetable with head. Explore this bizarre and fun with fast-paced action that will surprise you every second.

Help Robin and her friends to fight against the evil kingdom of vegetables. Throw yourself in this amazing world, asisted for the banana and the squire tomato.

Fight in 3 fruity levels, handmade with different enemies in every corner!.

Go throw the city with the pumpkin destroying everyone you find!

Discover the amazing history of Berry Jones throw his journals!

Fight against powerful bosses!

Credits:

This game has made with the effort of 3 developers of the University of ENTI (Barcelona).

Sergi Sanchez Solares as Producer, Game Designer & Developer.

Oscar Espejo Sagues as Level Designer & Developer.

Samuel Balcells Valdivia as Lead Developer.

Also we had the artist part from Roger Prior and Dimas Alcalde.

Sound/Sounds effects: freesound.org, opengameart.com

Font: dafont.com

Get it now totally FREE!

The succession of this game and the continue developing of them is only possible thanks to your support: You can help future titles buying this game or sharing to your friends.

Every little bit helps! Thank you!
